extendedInfo.description: If you are Linkin Park's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Linkin Park's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Linkin Park's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Linkin Park's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Hybrid Theory- Reanimation- Meteora- Collision Course- Minutes to Midnight- A Thousand Suns- Living Things--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- 1stp Klosr- A Place For My Head- Big Pimpin' / Papercut- Blackout- Bleed It Out- Breaking The Habit- Burn It Down- Burning In The Skies- By Myself- By_Myslf- Castle Of Glass- Chali- Crawling- Cure For The Itch- Dirt Off Your Shoulder / Lying From You- Don't Stay- Easier To Run- Enth E Nd- Faint- Fallout- Figure.09- Forgotten- Frgt/10- From The Inside- Given Up- H! Vltg3- Hands Held High- Hit The Floor- I'll Be Gone- In Between- In My Remains- In Pieces- In The End- Iridescent- Izzo / In The End- Jigga What / Faint- Krwlng- Kyur4 Th Ich- Leave Out All The Rest- Lies Greed Misery- Lost In The Echo- Lying From You- My{Dsmbr- No More Sorrow- No Roads Left- Nobodyâs Listening- Numb- Numb / Encore- One Step Closer- P5hng Me A*wy- Papercut- Plc.4 Mie Haed- Points Of Authority- Points Of Authority / 99 Problems / One Step Closer- Powerless- PPr:Kut- Pts.Of.Athrty- Pushing Me Away- Riff Raff- Rnw@y- Roads Untraveled- Robot Boy- Runaway- Shadow Of The Day- Skin To Bone- Somewhere I Belong- Stef- The Catalyst- The Little Things Give You Away- The Messenger- The Radiance- The Requiem- Until It Breaks- Valentine's Day- Victimized- Waiting For The End- What I've Done- When They Come For Me- Wisdom, Justice And Love- With You- Wretches And Kings- Wth>You- X-Ecutioner Style
